sentences.en: And now the Vimy's starboard engine suddenly began to rattle like a machine gun.
sentences.cn: 就在这时候,“维米号 ’ 右舷发动机突然像机关枪似的嗒峪嗒地响—了起来.

sentences.en: Bottles rattled as he stacked the beer crates.
sentences.cn: 他把啤酒箱摞起来，酒瓶咣当咣当地响。

sentences.en: Dan banged on her door and rattled the handle.
sentences.cn: 丹砰砰地敲她的门，还把门把手拽得咯吱作响。

sentences.en: Every time a bus went past, the windows rattled.
sentences.cn: 每逢公共汽车经过这里，窗户都格格作响。

sentences.en: From there rose the rattle and chatter and whistling.
sentences.cn: 那儿发出一阵阵格格声、人语声和哨声.

sentences.en: he rattled off some instructions.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆下达了若干指示。

sentences.en: His confidence was rattled by the accident.
sentences.cn: 这场事故动摇了他的自信。

sentences.en: His mocking smile rattled her more than his anger.
sentences.cn: 他那种嘲讽的微笑比他的愤怒更让她慌乱。

sentences.en: If he's trying to rattle your cage, it's working.
sentences.cn: 如果他存心要让你不得安宁的话，那他是得逞了。

sentences.en: In this performance, Rattle had the acoustic of the Symphony Hall on his side.
sentences.cn: 这场演出中，拉特尔有交响乐大厅出色的音响效果做他的后盾。

sentences.en: It was hard not to get rattled when the work piled up.
sentences.cn: 工作积了一大堆，哪能不着急呢。

sentences.en: Ku's head shook like a child's hand rattle as he replied , " Nonsense!
sentences.cn: 顾先生头摆得像小孩子手里的摇鼓道: “ 哪里的话!

sentences.en: My baby pictures show a silver rattle in my hand.
sentences.cn: 我有几张婴孩时期的照片,可以看出我手上拿的是银做的响铃.

sentences.en: Once she started to talk about herself, she would rattle away for a long time.
sentences.cn: 只要讲到她自己, 她就喋喋不休地讲个没完.

sentences.en: She could hear the rattle of the teacups.
sentences.cn: 她听见茶具叮当响.

sentences.en: She slams the kitchen door so hard I hear dishes rattle.
sentences.cn: 她把厨房门重重地关上，我甚至听到了碟子的震颤声。

sentences.en: The baby only shook the rattle and laughed and crowed.
sentences.cn: 孩子只是摇着拨浪鼓,笑着叫着.

sentences.en: The baby was playing with the rattle.
sentences.cn: 婴儿在玩拨浪鼓.

sentences.en: The rattle of the engine was very loud.
sentences.cn: 发动机的嘎嘎声很大.

sentences.en: The rattle of their picks was what woke me from my musing.
sentences.cn: 他们的鹤嘴锄发出来的卡嗒卡嗒声使我从沉思中清醒过来.

sentences.en: The window rattled in the wind.
sentences.cn: 窗户被风吹得咯吱作响。

sentences.en: There was a rattle of rifle-fire.
sentences.cn: 传来一阵步枪发出的嗒嗒声。

sentences.en: We could hear the rattle of milk bottles.
sentences.cn: 我们可以听到牛奶瓶的碰击声.

words.tran_cn: 很好的；活泼的；卡嗒卡嗒的
有轨电车；嘎声；绝顶典型；喋喋不休者
喋喋不休的人；吓吱声，格格声

phrases.tran_cn: 喋喋不休地讲话，哇啦哇啦讲个不停
以侵略行动相威胁。 参见 sabre-rattling
（不费力地）飞快说出（或写出）；匆匆做成

trans.tran_cn: 嘎嘎声，发出嘎嘎声的儿童玩具，呼噜声，音响构造
trans.tran_en: a short repeated sound, made when something shakes
to make a series of short loud sounds when hitting against sth hard; to make sth do this

trans.tran_cn: 迅速而嘎嘎作响地移动，堕下或走动
使紧张，使恐惧，给（桅索）扎梯绳
（使）发出格格的响声，（使）作嘎嘎声，喋喋不休地说话
